messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Phantom Plaza Pilferage DATE: 11/11/60 The courtroom was filled with a muted expectancy as the trial commenced. The prosecution invited the officers central to the investigation to share their testimonies. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Clark, the lead investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Lieutenant Clark. Can you narrate the events on the night the pilferage was detected? WITNESS: Yes. On the night of May 5th, Officer C. D. Davis spotted unauthorized individuals in Phantom Plaza and reported it. We initiated the investigation right away. PROSECUTOR: Who conducted the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Evans and Technician G. H. Ford were responsible for the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who led the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Graham and K. L. Hall took charge of interrogating the suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense initiated a cross-examination of Lieutenant Clark concerning the investigative strategies adopted. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Isaac, O. P. Johnson, and Q. R. Kelly were also called to the stand.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
